tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    usage_time TIME,
    energy_used DOUBLE,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
  consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  consumption_date DATE,
  consumption_value DECIMAL(10,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment (equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_cost (
  cost_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  consumption_id INT,
  price_per_unit DECIMAL(10,2),
  total_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (consumption_id) REFERENCES energy_consumption (consumption_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Energy_Consumption_Data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  consumption_date DATE,
  energy_consumed DECIMAL(10,2),
  CONSTRAINT fk_equipment_id FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Industrial_Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  CONSTRAINT fk_equipment_id_log FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Industrial_Equipment(equipment_id)
);
